Magisk.name: Magisk v25.2
Magisk.body:
This release brings several important updates and improvements:

• Added full support for Android 12
• Fixed SafetyNet attestation issues
• Improved MagiskHide stability
• Updated MagiskBoot for better compatibility
• Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Magisk.name: Magisk v25.1
Magisk.body:
Maintenance release with important fixes:

• Fixed bootloop issues on some devices
• Improved module mounting system
• Updated internal BusyBox to latest version
• Better error handling and logging

KernelSU.name: KernelSU v0.7.5
KernelSU.body:
Major update with new features:

• Added support for Android 14
• Improved kernel patch compatibility
• Enhanced module system
• Better SELinux handling
• Various stability improvements

Revanced Builder.name: Revanced Builder v3.2.0
Revanced Builder.body:
New release with important updates:

• Updated patches for latest app versions
• Added new customization options
• Improved build process
• Fixed compatibility issues
• Better error reporting
